title: Waimanu Valley
description: Lush, scenic valley offering a paved road, hiking, waterfalls, kalo fields & a black sand beach.

title: Mauna Kea
description: Towering, dormant volcano with a small lake & a 6-mile trail to the summit & its observatories.

title: Hapuna Beach
description: Wide, sandy beach offering restrooms, picnic areas & lifeguards, popular with families & locals.

title: Mauna Loa
description: Home to Mauna Loa Observatory, the world's largest active volcano is at 13,680 feet above sea level.

title: South Point
description: This remote, wind-swept locale features rugged clifftops & sweeping coastal views.

title: Kaumana Caves
description: Visitors to this tropical park can descend into a massive 1881 lava-tube cave formed by Mauna Loa.

title: Akaka Falls
description: Tropical rainforest park offering a .4-mile loop footpath leading up to a 442-foot scenic waterfall.

title: Pololu Valley
description: Scenic mountain valley offering lush vegetation, nature trails & an ocean beach with black sand.

title: Kilauea
description: Tropical rainforest park offering a .4-mile loop footpath leading up to a 442-foot scenic waterfall.

title: Kiholo Bay
description: This remote, protected bay features a pebble beach & marine life, such as green sea turtles.
